result.reason: UX design preference for inheritance defaults — maintainer already explained current behavior and how to configure default inheritance; the system works as designed, just differs from user's AD expectations
result.approach: No code change needed — this is a design preference, not a bug. The inheritance system works correctly; users can configure default inheritance via the root Connections node. Showing all properties on folders regardless of protocol would be the only actionable change but was acknowledged as optional by the maintainer.
